title: Comparison Testing - Validate against jsforce reference implementation
description: Create fixtures from jsforce query results to validate our SOQL implementation produces identical outputs. This ensures API compatibility with existing Salesforce integrations.

title: [RED] Test query endpoint (/query?q=SELECT...)
description: Write failing tests for the SOQL query endpoint. Tests should verify: GET /services/data/vXX.0/query?q=SELECT+Id,Name+FROM+Account returns records array, totalSize, done flag, nextRecordsUrl for pagination. Test various SOQL queries.

title: [RED] Test SOQL date literals (THIS_MONTH, LAST_N_DAYS)
description: Write failing tests for SOQL date literals: TODAY, YESTERDAY, TOMORROW, THIS_WEEK, LAST_WEEK, THIS_MONTH, LAST_MONTH, THIS_QUARTER, THIS_YEAR, LAST_N_DAYS:n, NEXT_N_DAYS:n, LAST_N_MONTHS:n, and fiscal period literals.

title: [GREEN] Implement SOQL query execution
description: Implement GET /services/data/vXX.0/query endpoint. Parse SOQL from query param, translate to SQLite, execute, and format response with totalSize, records[], done, nextRecordsUrl. Support queryMore for pagination.

title: Install jsforce for reference responses
description: Add jsforce as a dev dependency for generating reference test fixtures. Configure jsforce connection to a Salesforce sandbox/developer org. Document required environment variables (SF_USERNAME, SF_PASSWORD, SF_SECURITY_TOKEN).

title: [GREEN] Implement date literal resolution
description: Implement date literal parsing and resolution to actual date ranges. Handle timezone considerations. Convert to SQLite date comparisons (e.g., LAST_N_DAYS:7 -> date >= date('now', '-7 days')).

title: [GREEN] Implement dot notation traversal
description: Implement parent relationship traversal via dot notation. Generate appropriate JOINs for SQLite. Handle __r suffix convention (e.g., Account__r.Name for custom relationships).

title: [RED] Test GET /sobjects/Account matches Salesforce schema
description: Write failing tests for the SObject basic info endpoint. Tests should verify GET /services/data/vXX.0/sobjects/Account returns correct metadata including objectDescribe, recentItems structure. Compare against actual Salesforce API response.

title: [GREEN] Implement SOQL lexer/tokenizer
description: Implement the SOQL lexer to tokenize query strings into tokens (SELECT, FROM, WHERE, field names, operators, literals). Must handle SOQL-specific syntax including relationship dot notation.

title: [RED] Test describe endpoint (/sobjects/Account/describe)
description: Write failing tests for the SObject describe endpoint. Verify response includes all field metadata: name, type, label, length, precision, picklistValues, referenceTo, relationshipName. Must match Salesforce API schema exactly.

title: Compare our SOQL output against jsforce
description: Create comparison tests that execute the same SOQL queries against both jsforce (real Salesforce) and our implementation, then assert structural equality. Compare field types, relationships, and query results format.

title: [RED] Test SOQL relationship queries (parent.field)
description: Write failing tests for SOQL relationship traversal using dot notation. Tests should cover: Account.Name from Contact, nested relationships (Contact.Account.Owner.Name), and cross-object queries.

title: SOQL Parser - Parse and translate Salesforce queries to SQLite
[GREEN] Implement SObject metadata describe
description: Implement GET /services/data/vXX.0/sobjects/{SObjectName}/describe endpoint. Return complete field metadata from SQLite schema. Map SQLite types to Salesforce field types. Include relationship metadata.

title: [RED] Test SOQL SELECT field parsing
description: Write failing tests for SOQL SELECT clause parsing. Tests should verify: single field selection, multiple fields, field aliases, and basic syntax validation. Reference jsforce query syntax.

title: [RED] Test SOQL WHERE clause operators
description: Write failing tests for WHERE clause comparison operators: =, !=, <, >, <=, >=, LIKE, IN, NOT IN, INCLUDES, EXCLUDES. Test both single conditions and compound conditions with AND/OR/NOT.

title: [GREEN] Implement child relationship queries
description: Implement child relationship subquery parsing and execution. Nest query results in parent records. Handle relationship names (Contacts, Cases) mapping to child objects.

title: [RED] Test SOQL subqueries (nested SELECT)
description: Write failing tests for SOQL child relationship subqueries. Tests should cover: SELECT Id, (SELECT Name FROM Contacts) FROM Account, multiple subqueries, and subquery ordering.

title: Create fixtures from jsforce query results
description: Create a fixture generation script that runs SOQL queries via jsforce and saves responses as JSON fixtures. Generate fixtures for: Account queries, Contact queries with relationships, Opportunity queries with date filters, and describe metadata.

title: [GREEN] Implement WHERE condition AST
description: Implement the Abstract Syntax Tree builder for WHERE conditions. Parse comparison expressions, logical operators (AND/OR/NOT), and handle operator precedence. Generate SQLite-compatible WHERE clauses.

title: [REFACTOR] Optimize SOQL to SQLite translation
description: Refactor SOQL parser for performance and maintainability. Extract SQL generation into separate module. Add query plan optimization. Consider caching parsed ASTs for repeated queries.

title: REST API - Implement Salesforce REST API endpoints
description: Implement the core Salesforce REST API endpoints including /services/data/vXX.0/sobjects/, describe metadata, query execution, and CRUD operations on SObjects.

title: [GREEN] Implement Account SObject endpoint
description: Implement GET /services/data/vXX.0/sobjects/Account endpoint. Return SObject metadata with objectDescribe (name, label, fields, relationships). Support versioned API paths (v58.0, v59.0, etc).
